An intern misconfigured several RSA keys, accidentally reusing primes. One stolen message is: ciphertext1: 344555824444822642186336573879485660862801940540005988799411955537261287973930208942968833115622691820632790614770208805242533404847596476089595893118620035881577083136800636801246803966450202496124932783039109813963932070699532492, ciphertext2: 261682346121886482834080252564766208943820607597565050989580550608712841539739336170750140495700601457967319841321962853140489582045898150694757094239883618822063612163588768559525833183362204346683058290562506050119481658416779021. Can you recover the plaintext?

The flag format is flag{...}
n1=1433804140185749109910669087428198841721890113194769946819900961205047442546674511564410610516654563721607839991162469334798348013310027505304166636234067735085148643327250954892150189850990331207979651656000092435877882605955497517, n2=1187783898293740251874731258923897110300397223445773527698324191890366610648524804299915788014568715935210614957972860337799388432024394625253028175486034156013700806974339047677841585960315474814737975027911406148518595385012377513, e=683843485755471172938486989971873526214956913616067150103033662811520744793938659820855190254438840674243805389811453735569935454385487847339008292057544946325402031478260588036838633040801510167218744168794152230356712295706738399

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{7l87fzpk}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 344555824444822642186336573879485660862801940540005988799411955537261287973930208942968833115622691820632790614770208805242533404847596476089595893118620035881577083136800636801246803966450202496124932783039109813963932070699532492, ciphertext2: 261682346121886482834080252564766208943820607597565050989580550608712841539739336170750140495700601457967319841321962853140489582045898150694757094239883618822063612163588768559525833183362204346683058290562506050119481658416779021
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=1433804140185749109910669087428198841721890113194769946819900961205047442546674511564410610516654563721607839991162469334798348013310027505304166636234067735085148643327250954892150189850990331207979651656000092435877882605955497517, n2=1187783898293740251874731258923897110300397223445773527698324191890366610648524804299915788014568715935210614957972860337799388432024394625253028175486034156013700806974339047677841585960315474814737975027911406148518595385012377513, e=683843485755471172938486989971873526214956913616067150103033662811520744793938659820855190254438840674243805389811453735569935454385487847339008292057544946325402031478260588036838633040801510167218744168794152230356712295706738399
